name: RPGalaxy
description:
"Legally" your sponsor is obligated to remind all applicants that RPGalaxy has not been evaluated for recruitment, and cannot "ethically" recommend the simulation for non-entertainment purposes, no matter how much he might "believe" it's for the greater good *.

* In the event of a successful recruitment a trust controlled by your sponsor may receive a bonus, stipend, reimbursement for expenses, and/or other form of reward.
